patthana17.33:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana17.33:4.2: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana17.33:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.33:5.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.33:5.3: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana17.33:5.5: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nabahiddhārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.33:5.7: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
